TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4266=The guys will return stateside in a big way when they take over Las Vegas in July for 30th anniversary celebrations being dubbed "After Dark." Beginning July 10th, they'll spend four days hosting parties and events as well as performing at Planet Hollywood (the venue currently housing Britney Spears' residency)., 3182=Though the New Kids (now known as NKOTB) reigned during the teen-pop boom of the 90's, they disbanded in 1994 following a botched attempt to scruff up their clean-cut image. The boys, now men, would reunite 14 years later for a comeback album ("The Block") and a tour that began at Toronto's Air Canada Centre on September 18, 2008. The 48-show circuit also included stops in the U.S., the UK, Ireland, France, the Netherlands and Germany., 2190=New Kids on the Block performed with Boyz II Men on the Boston Strong telethon on May, 30, 2013. They're also slated to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame later this year., 2708=Two years later, NKOTB would become NKOTBSB as the group merged with The Backstreet Boys and announced a tour for the summer of 2011. It was followed in 2013 by "The Package" tour with 98 Degrees and Boyz II Men as the opening acts. The latter was a promotional tool for the group following the release of a new album titled "10," and the first single "Remix (I Like The)." The album made its debut at No. 6 on the Billboard 200 and No. 47 on the UK Albums Chart., 3924="The band has been focusing on all sorts of solo projects and now prepping for our European tour, but we knew we wanted to do something special stateside for 2014," Wahlberg said in a statement. "We knew we had a limited time block where we could do something fun and we knew we had to make it memorable! What better place than Vegas?"}
textBeforeTable: 2015 Tour Dates Low price $2 High price $1,711 Average Price $98 Past 12 Months Find Tickets New Kids On The Block Ticket Prices The group is best known for the songs "Hanging' Tough," "Step by Step" and "I'll Be Loving You Forever." New Kids on the Block (NKOTB) are one of the most quintessential American boy bands. Comprised of Donnie Wahlberg, Danny Wood, Joey McIntyre, Jordan Knight, and Jonathan Knight this dashing vocal powerhouse has gone to sell over 80 million records. With their reunion finalized and new material in the works, New Kids on the Block tickets are hotter than ever. About NKOTB New Kids on the Block performed with Boyz II Men on the Boston Strong telethon on May, 30, 2013. They're also slated to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame later this year. Two years later, NKOTB would become NKOTBSB as the group merged with The Backstreet Boys and announced a tour for the summer of 2011.
